001 import java.util.HashMap;
002 import java.util.Set;
003 
004/**
005 * Classe Room - un lieu du jeu d'aventure Zuul.
006 *     
007 * @author Pierre MATAR
008 */
009public class Room
010{
011    
012    private String aDescription;
013     private HashMap<String, Room> aExits; 
014    private HashMap<String, Boolean> aTrapDoors;
015    private String aImageName;
016    private ItemList aItems;
017    
018       
019    /**
020 * Constructor for the room, initializes the description and exits.
021 */
022
023    public Room(final String pDescription, final String pImage) {
024        this.aDescription = pDescription;
025        this.aExits = new HashMap<String, Room>();
026        this.aTrapDoors = new HashMap<String, Boolean>();
027        this.aImageName = pImage;
028        this.aItems = new ItemList();
029    }//Room
030    /**
031 * Returns the description of the room.
032 */
033    
034    public String getDescription() {
035        return this.aDescription;
036    }//getDescription
037    
038    /**
039 * Returns the room in the given direction.
040 */
041    
042    public Room getExit(String pDirection) {
043        return this.aExits.get(pDirection);
044        
045    }//getExit
046    
047    /**
048 * Returns a string of available exits from the room.
049 */
050    
051    public String getExitString() {
052        StringBuilder vSb = new StringBuilder("Exits:  ");
053        
054        for (String element : this.aExits.keySet()) {
055            if (this.aExits.get(element) != null)
056                vSb.append(element+" ");
057        }
058
059        return vSb.toString();
060        
061    }//getExitString
062    /**
063 * Returns a detailed description of the room including exits.
064 */
065    
066    public String getLongDescription() {
067        
068        return "You are " + this.aDescription + ".\n" + this.getExitString() +this.aItems.getAllItemString(this);
069    }
070    
071 
072    
073/**
074 * Sets an exit in a given direction, specifying if it is a trap door.
075 * 
076 * @param pDirection  The direction of the exit.
077 * @param pNeighbor   The neighboring room in the specified direction.
078 * @param pIsTrapDoor True if the exit is a trap door; otherwise, false.
079 */
080       public void setExit(final String pDirection, final Room pNeighbor, final Boolean pIsTrapDoor) {
081        this.aExits.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
082        this.aTrapDoors.put(pDirection, pIsTrapDoor != null ? pIsTrapDoor : false );
083    }
084    
085    /**
086 * Sets an exit in a given direction without specifying trap door status.
087 * By default, the exit is not a trap door.
088 * 
089 * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
090 * @param pNeighbor  The neighboring room in the specified direction.
091 */
092    
093    public void setExit(final String pDirection, final Room pNeighbor) {
094        this.setExit(pDirection, pNeighbor, false);
095    }
096    
097    /**
098 * Returns the name of the image file associated with the room.
099 * 
100 * @return The image file name.
101 */
102    
103    public String getImageName()
104    {
105         return this.aImageName;
106   }
107   
108   /**
109 * Checks if a given room is one of the exits from the current room.
110 * 
111 * @param pRoom The room to check.
112 * @return True if the specified room is an exit; otherwise, false.
113 */
114    public boolean isExit(Room pRoom) {
115        return this.aExits.containsValue(pRoom);
116    }
117    
118    /**
119 * Checks if the exit in a specified direction is a trap door.
120 * 
121 * @param pDirection The direction to check.
122 * @return True if the exit is a trap door; otherwise, false.
123 */
124     public boolean isTrapDoor(String pDirection) {
125        return this.aTrapDoors.get(pDirection);
126    }
127    
128    /**
129 * Removes an exit in the specified direction.
130 * 
131 * @param pDirection The direction to remove.
132 */
133   
134    public void removeDirection(final String pDirection) {
135        this.aExits.remove(pDirection);
136    }
137    /**
138 * Adds an item to the room.
139 * 
140 * @param pItem The item to add to the room.
141 */
142   
143    public void addItem(final Item pItem) {
144        this.aItems.addItem(pItem);
145    }
146    /**
147 * Retrieves an item from the room based on its name.
148 * 
149 * @param pItemName The name of the item to retrieve.
150 * @return The item if it exists in the room; otherwise, null.
151 */
152    public Item getItem(final String pItemName) {
153        return this.aItems.getItem(pItemName);
154    }
155    /**
156 * Removes an item from the room based on its name.
157 * 
158 * @param pItemName The name of the item to remove.
159 */
160    
161    public void removeItem(final String pItemName) {
162        this.aItems.removeItem(pItemName);
163    }
164   
165} // Room
